features.title: Comprehensive Company Overview
features.description: Highlights the mission, vision, and educational philosophy of HelloWorldKids, focusing on empowering the next generation of coders.

features.title: Platform Features Showcase
features.description: Detailed descriptions of the coding platform, including interactive tutorials, coding challenges, and progress tracking tools designed for kids.

features.title: Success Stories

features.title: Contact & Partnership Opportunities
features.description: Information on how to get in touch with HelloWorldKids for partnerships, collaborations, or inquiries.

data.overview: iHRJobs is a comprehensive recruitment platform designed to connect employers with potential candidates efficiently and effectively. The platform offers an intuitive user interface that simplifies the hiring process for both recruiters and job seekers.

features.title: Advanced Job Search
features.description: A powerful search feature that allows users to filter job listings by location, industry, experience level, and more.

features.title: User Profiles & Resume Upload
features.description: Candidates can create detailed profiles and upload their resumes, making it easier for recruiters to find the right match.

features.title: Employer Dashboard
features.description: A dedicated dashboard for employers to post jobs, manage applications, and communicate directly with candidates.

features.title: Application Tracking
features.description: A system that enables both recruiters and job seekers to track the status of applications in real-time.

features.title: Mobile-Responsive Design
features.description: Optimized for mobile devices, ensuring a seamless experience for users on the go.

technologies.title: Frontend
technologies.description: Developed using React.js, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, ensuring a modern and responsive design.

technologies.title: Version Control
technologies.description: Utilized Git for version control, with the codebase hosted on GitHub to facilitate collaborative development and maintain code integrity.

data.overview: Search4Course is a global platform that helps students find and compare study courses from institutions around the world. The website provides detailed information on courses, allowing users to make informed decisions about their education.

features.title: Global Course Database
features.description: Access to a vast database of courses offered by universities and educational institutions worldwide, searchable by location, field of study, and degree level.

features.title: Advanced Filtering Options
features.description: Users can refine their search results based on criteria such as tuition fees, duration, mode of study, and language of instruction.

features.title: Detailed Course Information
features.description: Comprehensive course descriptions, including curriculum details, entry requirements, and application deadlines.

features.title: User Reviews & Ratings
features.description: A feature that allows students to read and leave reviews, providing insights into the experiences of past and current students.

features.title: Responsive Design
features.description: Optimized for both desktop and mobile devices, ensuring a seamless user experience across all platforms.

technologies.title: Frontend
technologies.description: Developed with Next.js, utilizing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to deliver a fast, dynamic, and responsive interface.

technologies.title: Version Control
technologies.description: Managed using Git, with the repository hosted on GitHub to facilitate teamwork and version control.

data.overview: The iHRJobs App is a mobile application designed to extend the functionality of the iHRJobs recruitment platform to mobile users. The app provides a user-friendly experience for both job seekers and employers, enabling them to search, apply, and manage jobs on the go.

features.title: Job Search & Application
features.description: Users can search for jobs using various filters and apply directly through the app, streamlining the job application process.

features.title: Profile Management
features.description: Allows users to create and update their profiles, upload resumes, and manage their job preferences from their mobile devices.

features.title: Push Notifications
features.description: Real-time alerts for new job postings, application status updates, and messages from employers, keeping users informed and engaged.

features.title: Employer Dashboard
features.description: A mobile-friendly dashboard for employers to post jobs, review applications, and communicate with candidates.

features.title: Offline Access
features.description: Users can save job listings and profile updates to access them later, even without an internet connection.

technologies.title: Mobile Development
technologies.description: Built using React Native, ensuring a seamless and responsive experience across both iOS and Android platforms.

technologies.title: Version Control
technologies.description: Managed with Git, hosted on GitHub, allowing for continuous integration and collaborative development.

data.overview: iHRVision is an HR management app designed to streamline employee attendance tracking, leave requests, and time-off management. The app provides an intuitive platform for both employees and HR departments to manage and monitor HR-related tasks efficiently.

features.title: Attendance Tracking
features.description: Allows employees to clock in and out of work, with real-time attendance logs accessible to HR managers.

features.title: Leave Requests
features.description: Enables employees to submit requests for days off or leaves, which can be reviewed and approved by managers directly through the app.

features.title: Leave Balance & History
features.description: Employees can view their available leave balance and access a detailed history of past leaves and time off.

features.title: Push Notifications
features.description: Provides instant notifications for leave request approvals, attendance reminders, and important HR announcements.

features.title: Employee Dashboard
features.description: A personalized dashboard where employees can manage their profiles, view attendance records, and monitor leave status.

technologies.title: Mobile Development
technologies.description: Developed with React Native, ensuring compatibility and a smooth experience on both iOS and Android devices.

technologies.title: Version Control
technologies.description: Utilized Git for version control, with the codebase hosted on GitHub to support collaborative development and continuous integration.

data.overview: Tab3 is an advanced mobile application tailored for sales representatives, offering a comprehensive set of features that assist them in performing their tasks efficiently during fieldwork. The app ensures continuous connectivity with the company, enabling real-time tracking of movements and operations, which enhances performance monitoring and management.

features.title: Task Management
features.description: Provides sales reps with a clear overview of their daily tasks, appointments, and goals, helping them stay organized and focused.

features.title: Route Optimization
features.description: Automatically optimizes travel routes for sales reps, saving time and increasing efficiency during fieldwork.

features.title: Real-Time Communication
features.description: Enables instant communication between sales reps and the company, allowing for quick updates, feedback, and support.

features.title: Performance Tracking
features.description: Monitors and records the sales reps' activities and movements in real-time, providing the company with valuable insights into performance.

features.title: Sales Reporting
features.description: Allows sales reps to submit detailed reports on sales activities, customer interactions, and market feedback directly through the app.

features.title: Offline Mode
features.description: Ensures that sales reps can access essential features and record data even without an internet connection, syncing automatically when back online.

technologies.title: Mobile Development
technologies.description: Developed using React Native, providing a responsive and user-friendly experience on both iOS and Android platforms.

technologies.title: Version Control
technologies.description: Managed with Git, hosted on GitHub, ensuring efficient collaboration and version tracking.
